alert.note: Alert for Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:28AM EDT until June 14 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Muskingum County in east central Ohio... * Until 500 AM EDT. * At 428 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of New Concord to 7 miles west of South Zanesville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Philo, Fultonham, Ruraldale, Cannelville, East Fultonham, Duncan Falls, and Blue Rock State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
